# solana_recent_prioritization_fees (Data Source)

[(JSON RPC)](https://solana.com/docs/rpc/http/gethealth) Get recent prioritization fees for the network

## Example Usage

```terraform
# Basic Usage
data "solana_recent_prioritization_fees" "testnet" {}

# Fees for Specific Addresses
data "solana_recent_prioritization_fees" "addrs" {
  accounts = ["..."]
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Optional

- **accounts** (List of String) An array of account addresses as base-58 encoded strings.
- **id** (String) The ID of this resource.

### Read-Only

- **recent_fees** (List of Object) The results of the recent priority fee query. (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--recent_fees))

<a id="nestedatt--recent_fees"></a>
### Nested Schema for `recent_fees`

Read-Only:

- **fee** (Number)
- **slot** (Number)
